title: AI Mugshot Generator
playgroundDescription: Curious how you’d look in a mugshot? Upload a photo, and the Mugshot Generator will produce a detailed, police-style portrait automatically, with no manual work needed.

metadata.title: Free AI Mugshot Generator Online
metadata.description: Generate realistic AI mugshots online for free. Upload a photo and let the AI create a detailed, law-enforcement-style portrait instantly.

questions.question: What is the Mugshot effect?
questions.answer: The Mugshot effect is an AI image effect that turns your photo into a classic police mugshot with the right background, lighting, and style.

questions.question: How long does it take to apply the Mugshot effect?
questions.answer: It’s very fast! Most photos are transformed in just a few seconds, depending on the size and detail of the image.

questions.question: Is the Mugshot effect free?
questions.answer: Yes! You can try it for free after signing up. New users get free credits to use on this effect and other AI tools.

questions.question: Are my photos safe?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Your photos are uploaded securely and deleted from our servers after a short time. We never share your images.

questions.question: What kind of photos work best?
questions.answer: Clear, front-facing photos with good lighting work best—like passport-style pictures.

reviews.review: I'm genuinely impressed with the quality. The integration with Max Studio is just the cherry on top for my projects.
reviews.name: Oliver

reviews.review: This is so simple and effective. I finally get the results I want without spending hours editing.
reviews.name: Chloe

reviews.review: Absolutely brilliant tool for any creative. It has saved me so much time and effort.
reviews.name: Samuel

steps.title: Upload Your Photo
bulletPoints: Choose and upload a photo from your device to use with Mugshot. Ensure the image is high-quality and well-lit for the best results.

steps.title: Apply the Mugshot Effect
bulletPoints: Once your photo is uploaded, click the “Apply Image Effect” button to transform it with the Mugshot effect.

steps.title: Save & Share
bulletPoints: Download your Mugshot creation to your device and share it with friends, family, or on your favorite social media platforms.
